DeepSpiringMod:Sampling.NAME: Sampling
DESCRIPTIONS: At the #yend of the turn, play 1 card in your discard pile randomly.
At the #yend of the turn, play %d cards in your discard pile randomly.

DeepSpiringMod:RecursionDepth.NAME: RecursionDepth
DESCRIPTIONS: When the number of stacks reaches #y10, stop all forward propagation and add an #yOverflow in your hand.

DeepSpiringMod:Loss.NAME: Loss
DESCRIPTIONS: Current loss of the model. Reducing the stacks of #rLoss is beneficial for improving the #yAP .

DeepSpiringMod:Overfitting.NAME: Overfitting
DESCRIPTIONS: The current model's adaptability to unseen datasets. Excessive #rOverfitting stacks will reduce the #yAP .

DeepSpiringMod:AP.NAME: AP
DESCRIPTIONS: It is related to the #yLoss and #rOverfitting stacks, which affect the effectiveness of #yForward #yPropagation. Currently %.2f.

DeepSpiringMod:Convolution.NAME: Convolution
DESCRIPTIONS: Play a #yFeature #yMap with attacks and blocks, whose values are equal to the convolution of all card values in the discard pile multiplied by the #yAP. The length of the convolution kernel is %d, the element at the center of the kernel is 1, and the elements in each outer layer are half of those in the previous layer.
